title: rango unchained
body: I think I've been playing rango wrong. I'd been playing him like xin as a balls deep initiator but I think I need to drop the engage and play as a cleanup crew, assassinating the carries once the fight is already happening.

replies.body: Can play him either way tbh.
Lol I play xin like u want to play Rango.
I tend to build damage first then tank up a bit for late game.
Yeah same but his ulti stats and effect and his sustain mean he can still jump into a 1v5 to initiate or flash ulti someone at his team and then dash to them as a semi-escape mechanism.
You need to learn how to build because that is awful.
To be fair I've been getting a little better  but not in a position to carry a team yet.
was expecting a siq fan art, disappointed tho. TAKE MY DOWNVOTE!
